title: Two Democrats disinvited to Governors dinner
shortDescription: President Trump breaks tradition and has excluded two Democratic governors from a White House dinner.

title: Dem governors threaten to boycott White House dinner over disinvites
shortDescription: More than a half dozen Democrats said Donald Trump disinviting two of their colleagues is the latest example of administration's 'chaos and division.'

title: 'This is how a wave starts': Democrat wins Louisiana special election
shortDescription: On the heels of a state legislative win in Texas, Democrats saw a 37-point swing that kept a Louisiana state House seat in their ranks

title: Susan Collins confirms 2026 Maine re-election run
shortDescription: Sen. Susan Collins, a Republican from Maine, posted an unboxing video to confirm her run for re-election in 2026.

title: Trump threatens to block Detroit Windsor bridge
shortDescription: President Trump is threatening to block the Detroit Windsor Bridge until the U.S. receives full compensation, questioning Canada's ownership and trade deals.

title: Howard Lutnick denies relationship with Jeffrey Epstein at Senate
shortDescription: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said he had nothing to hide about his meetings with Jeffrey Epstein but a senator questioned his credibility.

title: GOP senator announces reelection bid in key 2026 race
shortDescription: Republican Sen. Susan Collins confirmed she is running for a sixth term, setting up what could be a costly, key 2026 midterm fight.

title: ICE on hot seat as officials testify before Congress: live updates
shortDescription: Top immigration officials are testifying before the Homeland Security Committee amid a backlash over immigration operations in Minnesota.

title: GOP congressman calls for FCC action over Bad Bunny's Super Bowl show
shortDescription: Florida congressman Randy Fine is calling for FCC action against Bad Bunny over alleged explicit lyrics during the Super Bowl halftime show.

title: Trump threatens to block the opening of US-Canada bridge
shortDescription: The Gordie Howe International Bridge, a $4.6 billion infrastructure project that connects Detroit with Windsor, Ontario, was approved in 2014.

title: Will DHS shut down? Reform talks between Dems, White House ongoing
shortDescription: Lawmakers have only a matter of days to stave off a shutdown of the much-scrutinized agency â€“ though ICE would continue to operate.

title: Trump excludes two Democrats from White House dinner with governors
shortDescription: President Trump has excluded two Democratic governors, Wes Moore of Maryland and Jared Polis of Colorado, from a White House dinner with governors.

title: Multifaith groups sue Trump's Religious Liberty Commission over lack of diversity
shortDescription: The complaint said the commission lacks the perspective of those "who face some of the most pernicious discrimination."

title: Trump calls it the 'Gulf of America,' but what about locals, tourists?
shortDescription: It's been a year since President Trump renamed the Gulf of Mexico the Gulf of America. We asked people along its shores what they actually call it.
